long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a nifty little extension which generates a QR code for each webpage you visit. This is useful if you're doing mobile device testing on a website with an obscure or long URL, or if you are on a webpage, but need to move to a mobile device and don't want to creatively copy the URL.
